name: MARGO: The Last Chance
description:
The game is in early stages of development. This is my first serious project.

Currently there is support for keyboard and gamepad. Added touch controls for smartphones and tablets. The engine was used to create Construct 3.

Currently works great with HTML.

The main goal is to create a platformer with one big world, without loads.

Sets were used to create:

thanks!
